plot: Still stuck in the Cretaceous period, Connor and Abby continue their mission to survive and find a way back to the present where the ARC has been rebuilt and updated with two new members.

After a year in the Cretaceous, Abby and Connor finally escape through an anomaly to their own time after finding a lost anomaly device in a raptor's bower, only to be followed through by a giant Spinosaurus. Soon accosted by a brand new ARC team, they manoeuvre the creature into a massive arena, where, dangling from the roof, Connor accidentally drops the device into the Spinosaurus, imploding it from the inside. But being away for so long has left Connor and Abby out of the loop, and they soon find their ARC jobs in jeopardy...—Anonymous

After being trapped in the Cretaceous period for a year Abby and Connor finally return home through a portal but there is no news of Danny. Philip Burton,a millionaire inventor,is financing the ARC,to Sir James' disapproval,and Captain Becker is none too thrilled with Matt,Cutter's successor with his love of developing gadgetry. Scatty computer operator Jess completes the new team. A giant spinosaurus has followed the couple through the anomaly and is eventually trapped in an arena and sent back to its own time.However Abby and Connor are told that their services at the ARC are no longer required,though the mysterious Gideon tells Matt he feels they should remain.—don @ minifie-1
